::Autofire::

His systems have been offline for a long time now. Ever since Hell 
Beast had occupied the cave, a cave in had trapped him in ice. Unable 
to fight out, Autofire had been forced to go into stasis lock to save 
his life. Many months, perhaps even years, have passed from that 
time, with Autofire remaining under the ice in stasis lock.

The rumble that passed through the cave as Megatron began to force 
his way through the ice wall was the first wake up call to Autofire's 
systems. They had been completely immobile for a long time, and now 
the shaking was booting some of them up. The second call came with a 
huge tremmor, shaking the ice off of Autofire as a child would shake 
dried earth from a long lost toy. Autofire's systems began to fully 
reactivate, some of them damaged, but most were in good shape. In a 
few seconds his optics light up.

With the groan of gears that had not been moved in a long time, 
Autofire stood up from what had been his icy tomb. He stood tall, 
easilly topping 16 feet. His body was almost totaly black, with some 
red coloring in some places as well. With night falling outside, it 
was nearly impossible to see any of Autofire's features except for 
his bulk and his many weapons sticking out of his shoulders and 
torso. A light flickered on, the source of the light attached to the 
top-left part of Autofire's head. He looked around, everything now 
visible. Autofire looked like a seasoned warrior, with the gashes and 
scrapes of combat, though they had been mostly brought on by the 
cavein that had trapped in. He was large but well-porportioned, and 
would be agile as well as strong in combat. Two guns were attached to 
each side of his torso, as well as a gun each on his forearms, and a 
missile launcher on his shoulder. His optics had the ability to fire 
laser bolts. For hand-held weapons he used a pair of chainguns, 
stored in his wrists. Taking out one of these chainguns, Autofire 
looks around, spotting Megatron.

"Identify yourself," the bot growls, approaching Megatron with the 
chaingun leveled at the Decepticon's head.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron gasped for air, he had been digging a long while, and 
hadnt found
> anything, he was almost out of energon, and if he didnt find 
anything, he
> might die out in the arctic. No, he cant, he took a step back, and 
wound up
> his fist, and shot it forward with all his might into the icy wall, 
a huge
> rumble coming from his immences strength, as the ice cracked, and 
the wall
> gave way, as the hundreds of tons of ice above came crashing down, 
and in
> all the chaos, of the huge tremors, and the large amout of ice 
falling,
> Megatron had to aim his cannon upwards, and with what remained of 
his
> energy, fire a huge blast, to keep himself from getting buried. The 
stream
> of raw power cut through the ice falling towards him, melting it as 
soon as
> his power hit it. Then there was silence.
> 
> He fell to the ground, panting, his energy reserves where almost 
used up in
> that blast, and a huge hole where all the ice fell remained, "I 
must get
> the .... energy" he whispered, as he crawled forward.
